pullrequest.title: Added model_args and hand_suffix arguments to all vrc_final and drc_practice launchfiles

content.raw:
I've tabled the issue by making the default hand_suffix for all of the tasks "_sandia_hands".

However, this command won't work (trying to launch atlas without any hands):

```
roslaunch drcsim_gazebo vrc_final_task1.launch model_args:="_v4" hand_suffix:=""
```

Steve has made issue #452 for this problem. Think it should get solved in this pull request, or at a later date?
